summary: The module supplies a collection of modular neural network components for constructing three‑dimensional UNet architectures, covering downsampling, upsampling, and middle processing stages. Variants incorporate cross‑attention mechanisms and are specialized for handling pure spatial data, motion dynamics, and spatio‑temporal video representations, enabling flexible assembly of diffusion‑based generative models.
business_intent: To provide developers of diffusion and generative AI systems with ready‑to‑use, interchangeable blocks that simplify building high‑performance 3D and video UNet models, especially those requiring motion‑aware or spatio‑temporal conditioning via attention mechanisms.
